final_mermaid_code:
graph TD
    A[Special order received] --> B[Register order]
    B --> C[Check order details]
    C --> D{ParallelGateway}
    
    subgraph ConfirmAndManufacture[Confirm and manufacture]
        direction TB
        D --> E[Manufacture custom product]
        D --> F[Confirm order]
        E --> G[Product manufactured]
        F --> H[Order confirmed]
        G --> I[Plan shipment]
        H --> I
        J[Change request received] --> K[Handle change request]
        K --> C
    end

    I --> L[Check customer type and shipment status]
    L --> M{XORGateway}
    M --> N[Ship custom product]
    M --> O[Emit invoice]
    M --> P[Charge customer account]
    N --> Q{ParallelGateway}
    O --> Q
    P --> Q
    Q --> R[Archive order]
    R --> S[Order fulfilled]
    P --> T[Update customer]
    T --> U[Customer updated]
